text: Xinshi 1st Rd () is a light rail station of the Green Mountain line of the Danhai Light Rail, which is operated by New Taipei Metro. It is located in Tamsui District, New Taipei, Taiwan. ==Station overview== The station is an elevated station with two side platforms.
